rounds.category: THEY NAMED A CITY FOR HIM

clues.text: This capital & second-largest city of Wisconsin was named for the fourth U.S. president

Quincy, Massachusetts was named for Colonel John Quincy, grandfather of this first lady
A town in Eastern Pennsylvania honors this Native American & all-around athlete who was laid to rest there

rounds.category: LET'S GO TO THE AUTO SHOP

clues.text: If your car's engine uses this type of fuel, don't look for the spark plugs; it uses glow plugs

rounds.category: THE ACTOR REALLY SAVES THE DAY!

clues.text: Mission: Possible! He not only rescued a family from a burning sailboat but got a hit-&-run victim to a hospital & paid her $7K bill
In 2001 he flew a helicopter, not the Millennium Falcon, to spot & help rescue a lost boy scout near Yellowstone

"Are you famous?" asked the kid he rescued from a flipped car near his Malibu home; "Yeah, I'm a doctor"; how McDreamy!

rounds.comments: (Ken: You'll have to identify the body part concealed in each clue.)
